Author: Sushisnac
Text: I had this problem when I had a fat mirror in my room. Any other mirror was too skinny and wrong. Then I realized that 90% of mirrors I was looking at made me look thinner, and most were in random public bathrooms (im always cautious of fitting room mirrors since I assume theyâ€™re more slimming). Therefore the biggest was wrong.

Author: analeonhardt
Text: I had the same thought while I was trying on clothes at Target. There was like three mirrors and I could see all angles and I legit thought they had mirrors that make you look skinnier.
